Ad Name: 1 Bedroom High-rise Condo – Available Now (Richmond Centre)

Say hello to a gorgeous, mint, and cozy 607 sqft. unfurnished 1 BR / 1 Bath suite at The Residences by Bosa. - Elegant engineering hardwood flooring throughout
- Kitchen Aid stainless steel appliances
- Silestone quartz countertops
- Breakfast bar
- Kitchen backsplash
- Double sink and faucet

- Window coverings

- Key Fob secured complex

RentalOffice is located at 810 St. Andrews Street.
 
RedwoodManor is a five-storey apartment rental property in New Westminster, BC.  The building is in an excellent location inNew Westminster within the Queen’s Park neighbourhood.  Living at Redwood Manor places you withinonly 800 metres of the SkyTrain with connections to Vancouver or Surrey.  The Royal City Centre Mall is only a 7 minutebus ride providing you with excellent shopping conveniences.  Redwood Manor also provides car drivers witheasy access to the highway.
Stop by today and make RedwoodManor your new home! 
 
What's included in your rent
Water
Have Questions? Contact the Property Manager: 778-402-8584
 
Building Features
The building only has 48 suites with a mix of 1 and 2 bedroom apartments ranging in size from 680 sq. ft. to 950 sq. ft. All suites are bright and spacious and come with stunning hardwood floors, electric kitchens appliances and white cabinets. Even more    fantastic are the views the suites can offer you; unappalled views of the mountain and Fraser River.  4 suites are located on the penthouse levels and provide direct access to the recently renovated roof deck.
Laundry – Shared (onsite)
Roof deck (some units)
Elevator
Microwaves & dishwashers 
Covered parking    
 
Neighbourhood Features
Neighbourhood Features:
The neighbourhood has a Farmers Market in nearby Tipperary Park, churches, an elementary school, and the scenic boardwalk of Westminster Pier Park. Redwood also borders the picturesque Queens Park Heritage neighborhood.

Ad Name: Centrally located home in quiet neighborhood
Description:
A well kept, partially furnished 3-Bedroom suite in a family oriented neighbourhood in East Cambie is available for rent in September to responsible tenants. This is for the larger upstairs suite of the house (1450 Sq. Ft), which includes:
- an expansive open kitchen with dishwasher and a double sink,
- self-contained laundry,
- 3 large bedrooms,
- 2 full bathrooms (larger one with a double sink),
- hardwood/laminated and tile flooring,
- plenty of windows with lots of natural light,
- internet included (WiFi), and
- 2 parking spots (1 garage and 1 driveway).
The downstairs suite is fully enclosed with a separate entrance. This house is steps away from Albert Airey Park, walkable to bus transit (410 bus on Cambie St., 430 bus on Bridgeport St.) which can then transfer onto the Canada Line (Aberdeen and Bridgeport Stations). It is also walkable to Cambie Plaza featuring plenty of restaurants, groceries, and a public library. Mitchell Elementary and Cambie Secondary catchment.
The location has quick access to the Oak and Knight St. Bridges along with the BC-99 and BC-91 highways. By car, it is a quick 5-10 minute drive to:
- Costco,
- Walmart,
- T&T Supermarket,
- Ikea,
- Kwantlen University (Richmond Campus), and
- YVR Airport.

Ad Name: 1 Bdrm available at 11675 Seventh Avenue, Richmond
Description:
Visit our Website: https://www.caprent.com/apartments-for-rent/richmond-bc/fraser-place/
Fraser Place Apartments, the amenities and features you deserve 
Three low-rise buildings invite you to enjoy the serenity of lush landscaping and a central courtyard complete with a gazebo and pond. Most of our apartments are equipped with dishwashers, balconies and all have carpet throughout the living and dining rooms. The spacious layouts offer you more than enough living space for your needs. Situated in the charming seaside community of Old Steveston Village, you are also wonderfully close to all of Richmond's attractions. 
And, since work isn’t everything, you’re also less than a five minute walk to Garry Point Park, the West Dyke Trail, a tranquil Japanese garden and the ocean. Take in a day at the ocean, then come home to our Fraser Place apartments and enjoy the perfect ocean evening breezes. Fraser Place apartments also includes an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre, social/games room and a common barbecue area. These apartments for rent in Richmond are all at a location that’s exactly where you want to be. 
Parking from: $40.00

Ad Name: 1 bed price w/ 2 parking, 9" ceiling, top floor, private corner
Description:
Huge 1 bed price with 2 parking, high ceiling, top floor, at private and quiet corner. Individual corner unit with no unit in above.
This is a fantastic opportunity to live in a quiet and safe neighbourhood in Central Richmond. Spacious 846sf, 9” high ceiling, corner unit, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, and 2 parking located at Laguna. Master bedroom has walk-in closet, ensuite bathroom. The living and dining space lead to a Southeast facing. The gas fireplace is perfect for cold winter nights and the in-suite laundry.
Amazing location - General Currie Elementary and 3 high schools are only minutes away. Skytrain, Richmond Center and new Minoru Community Center are walking distance. This suite also comes with 2 secure underground parking and extra storage locker. Amenities include club house for entertaining, 2 gyms, guest parking, and amazing caretaker.
